Meowth (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0051: Dugtrio
Pokémon
#0053: Persian →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Meowth (TCG Pocket).

Meowth has been featured on 51 different cards since it debuted in the Jungle expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Meowth cards are normally Colorless-type, Darkness-type, or Metal-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Meowth

Meowth
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
